analysis.description:
TieredPriceCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#613-632) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTimeTier2 > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#618-620)

TieredPriceCrowdsale._getbonusRate (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#632-656) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _tier4Start > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#647-656)
	- _tier3Start > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#642-656)
	- _tier2Start > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#638-656)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#1041-1049) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#1047)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#1067-1075) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#1070-1075)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#1081-1086) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/20/0x3323ce527bcb68e5e486b856c93ee63196adaea9.sol#1086)
